Document.TEXT: 0 More... Galadari Engineering Works Ltd Co. (L.L.C) Large-scale construction specialists, Galadari Engineering Works (GEW) is proud to be responsible for much of the construction of modern Dubai, including the world-famous Atlantis Palm. GEW was one of the first engineering and fabrication businesses in Dubai and has led the industry in mechanical, structural, marine and general engineering works for more than three decades. As part of the wider Galadari Brothers group, GEW work in close conjunction with Galadari Trucks and Heavy Equipment, providing a one-stop solution for equipment for construction projects of all sizes. Tel : + 971 4 266 7318 Fax : + 971 4 266 2151 Arab Emirates Bandac Co. L.L.C. Arab Emirates Bandac Co. LLC – established in 1973 – is a pioneer technical rubber and polyurethane products manufacturing and services company in the UAE – ISO9001:2008, ISO 18001 and ISO 14001 certified – providing superior products with excellent value for money. The activity covers – Application of Anticorrosive Lining and Coating Systems, Material Handling Systems, Marine Fender Systems, Building Car Park Protection System, Pipe Sealing System, Rubber Sheets, Bridge Bearing and Expansion Joint. AEB are master distributor/ service partner for REMA TIP TOP – GERMANY. Tel : + 971 4 2858317 / 2861160 Fax : + 971 4 2858891 / 2861170
